events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning this case to agent Sarah for handling the refund request efficiently.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received versus what you ordered?
My order number is 47839201. I attached photos showing the incorrect product I got instead of the item I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund confirmation soon. Thanks for your help.
The refund has been issued and you should see the amount credited back to your original payment method shortly.
We are following up to confirm if you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund appeared on my statement today. Everything has been handled perfectly, thank you!
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now; please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
